snippet: Jesus G. Garcia, known as Chuy, is trying to unseat Mayor Rahm Emanuel, but critics contend he is inconsistent in his positions, and vague about his plans to improve Chicago.
abstract: Voters in Chicago are not getting clear messages on issues from Jesus G Garcia, county commissioner who is competing against Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel in runoff election; critics of Garcia say he has offered only vague plans about how to address city's financial condition, which only adds to his status as underdog in race.
lead_paragraph: Jesus G. Garcia, known as Chuy, is trying to unseat Mayor Rahm Emanuel, but critics contend he is inconsistent in his positions, and vague about his plans to improve Chicago.

headline.main: Chicago Candidate With Sunny Attitude Is Cloudy on Specifics
headline.print_headline: Chicago Candidate With Sunny Attitude Is Cloudy on Specifics
